title: State Capitol Report: What Obama's Immigration Order Means For Wisconsin
teaser: According to Joy Cardin’s guest lawmaker, President Obama’s executive order on immigration protects the unity of families without jeopardizing national security. In the State Capitol Report, Representative JoCasta Zamarripa discusses how Obama’s action will affect people in Wisconsin, including the estimated 76,000 undocumented immigrants living in the state.
